title: Arunachal Pradesh: Landslide damages Subansiri hydroelectric project partially
description: The Subansiri Lower Hydro Electric Project, which commenced the construction work in January 2005 after obtaining forest clearance in October 2004, faced multiple bottlenecks since its inception causing huge delay in commissioning the mega power plant.
